short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Help you import WaiverForever data into membership management systems.
short.zh_CN: 帮助您将 WaiverForever 的数据导入会员管理系统。
short.zh_TW: 幫助您將 WaiverForever 的數據導入會員管理系統。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WaiverForever Connect helps you automatically fill your client's information from WaiverForever into your membership management of your choice. No more manual typing into fields, everything is now handled by a push of a button.
long.zh_CN,zh_TW: WaiverForever Connect helps you automatically fill your client's information into your membership management of choice. No more manual typing into fields, everything is now handled by a push of a button.
